mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room_rec (name, room_id, reg_date) values(#{name}, #{roomId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_no, r.counsel_no, r.client_id, r.state, r.reg_date, a.counselor_id, a.start, GROUP_CONCAT(s.symp) AS symp_csv FROM counsel_reservation r JOIN counsel_available a ON r.counsel_no = a.counsel_no JOIN counsel_reason cr ON r.reservation_no = cr.reservation_no JOIN symptom s ON cr.symp_code = s.symp_code WHERE r.reservation_no = #{reservationNo} GROUP BY r.reservation_no;
